text:
Jegenstorf (Bernese German: "Jegischtorf") is a municipality in the administrative district of Bern-Mittelland in the canton of Berne in Switzerland.
On 1 January 2010 the former municipality of Ballmoos merged into the municipality of Jegenstorf and
on 1 January 2014 the former municipalities of Münchringen and Scheunen merged into the municipality of Jegenstorf.
